page.title: 18Hampton Dollmaking Studio
page.content: The Doll Shop is situated on the Solihull Road, opposite the church.It used to be the village post office, has been smartened up and painted and bought by some people and then been turned into a doll studio, where they make and repair {China dolls} for which they make{Victorian} {clothes.}The clothes are made of leather, some with buckles and some with laces. They also have quite a few{Teddy Bears}that are crumbling because they are old. The shop has an old fashioned window and there are hanging flower baskets and trees are in tubs outside. They have put up a sign saying "The Dollmaking Studio".
